name: Canadian Product Incident Report Form
summary: An HCXS file is an incident report form used by the Government of Canada - Health Canada, which allows consumers to report cosmetic or consumer product incidents. It contains information about the report, such as the type, who is reporting, contact details, date of the incident, who was affected, description of the incident, name and manufacturer of the product, and where the product was purchased.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

web.display_name: Government of Canada Consumer Incident Report

windows.display_name: Government of Canada Consumer Incident Report
